channel.title: Cleft
channel.description:
What's New:

  • Fixed crash when deleting the last note.
  • Fixed issue where note turned to 'Untitled' immediately.
  • Fixed title update issue when selecting a different note quickly.
  • Set Title character limit to 100.
  • Now we copy the link when we click on the share button for the first time.
  • Added different hover text if a public link is available.
